Longan.ADKeyboard: Checks if the specified key on the ADkeyboard is pressed.
Longan.PIR: Checks whether the motion sensor is currently detecting any motion.
Longan.crashSensor: TODO: Checks whether the crash sensor is currently pressed.
Longan.dht11value: get dht11 temperature and humidity Value
Longan.lightIntensity: TODO: Set the brightness of on-board LED lamp.
Longan.mecanumWheel|param|LeftFront: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S1
Longan.mecanumWheel|param|LeftRear: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S2
Longan.mecanumWheel|param|RightFront: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S3
Longan.mecanumWheel|param|RightRear: A servo in the ServoList , eg: wuKong.ServoList.S4
Longan.setLightMode: TODO: Set the on-board LED display mode.
Longan.setMotorSpeed: TODO: Set the speed of M1 or M2 motor.
Longan.setMotorSpeed|param|motor: M1 or M2 motor , eg: MotorList.M1
